name: notification-system
description: RESTful notification system APIs with NodeJs

scripts.start: cd src & npx sequelize-cli db:migrate & node server.js
scripts.startprod: cd src && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production && node server.js
scripts.pretest: cd src && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db:drop:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db:create:test
scripts.db:drop:test: cd src && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:drop
scripts.db:create:test: cd src && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate

author: Andrew Hany
